bibl.title: Territory of Washington V. Sterling P. White. Certificate for Bill of Costs
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: I hereby certify that I have examined the foregoing bill of costs, and that the same amounting to the sum of $ is just and correct.
S.C. Hyde Prosecuting Attorney for Lincoln County.
I certify that I have examined the foreoing Bill of Costs, amounting to the sum of $ and the same appearing to me to be just and correct, is here- by approved and allowed.
George Turner Associate Justice Supreme Court Washtington Territory and Judge Fourth Judicial District.
Territory of Washington County of Spokane }ss.

I Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk of the Dstrict Court of the Territory of Wash- ington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, do hereby certify that the above and foregoing is a true and correct transcript of the costs in the above entitled cause, as the same now appears on record in my office.
IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed the seal of said court this 9th day of May 1885 Kate W. Feauerbach Clerk By R. Strobach Deputy.

In the District Court of Washington Territory, Fourth Judicial District Term at The Territory of Washington vs.
Bill of Costs Filed 188 Auditor
